summary: Ichigo\'s sword during the final fight with Aizen.
descriptionHtml:
If you want all the forms of Zangetsu, Download this mod instead http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24627/



For anyone who isn\'t a bleach fan, This Isn\'t a swastika, its a kanji on the sword meaning \"ban\" or many.

http://farm6.static.flickr.com/5219/5387221396_3f5468ccdb.jpg

Ichigo\'s sword has daedric stats, and you can forge it with the ebony smithing perk. 

I will be making a mod with all of the forms of Zangetsu very soon.

I hope you enjoy the sword, endorse if you want to see more :)


After 1.1 you can upgrade the sword at the forge. It will cost a black soul gem though
author: BattleyaxStudios

files.name: Final Tensa Zangetsu
files.changelogHtml: Now the sword can be upgraded through the forge, using black soulgems and ebony Ingots
